20% off your flight bookings

Book your flights on cleartrip.ae/adcbworld and enjoy 20% off on your flight tickets – any airline, any class. Use promo code ADCBWORLD.

Discount applicable on base fare (exclusive of taxes, fees and charges) of adult & child tickets for international round trips, limited to 6 bookings per card in a calendar year, capped at 9 passenger tickets per booking.

20% off your hotel bookings

Stay at one of over hundreds of thousands of hotels worldwide on hotels.com/adcbworld and enjoy 20% off on your hotel bookings – any property, anywhere in the world.
Use promo code ADCBWORLD.

Discount applicable on base charges (exclusive of taxes, fees and charges) for the first room in the booking paid online at Hotels.com, limited to 12 bookings per card in a calendar year, capped at up-to 28 nights per booking at participating hotels. You can’t collect or redeem Hotels.com™ Rewards nights when you use this promo code.

Up to 6 nights’ complimentary stay

  • Get a complimentary 2-night stay voucher when you sign up for the card, redeemable anywhere in the world.

The welcome voucher will be issued on payment of annual fee in the first year of card issuance. Voucher entitles the cardholder to a 2-night stay worth AED 1,000 redeemable at Hotels.com.

  • Enjoy up to 6 nights’ complimentary stay when you make annual purchases worth AED 150,000 and more.
Annual Spend Vouchers Value
AED 150,000 2-night stay AED 1,000
AED 200,000 4-night stay AED 1,500
AED 250,000 6-night stay AED 2,000

Complimentary Lounge Access

As a Traveller Card member, you enjoy unlimited self access to premium airport lounges across the many cities where you love to travel every year. For more information, please visit adcb.com/lounge

Discounts at Starwood Hotels & Resorts

Book two nights and get the third night free. This is applicable at 175 properties across Europe, the Middle East and Africa, including St. Regis, W Hotels, Westin, Sheraton, Le Meridien and The Luxury Collection. For your complimentary nights, please visit spg.com/mastercard to book your stay.

Complimentary Travel Insurance

Losing your luggage at the airport or falling sick while you are away from home can ruin your travel experience. The Traveller Credit Card comes with insurance to give you the necessary peace of mind to enjoy your trip.

As a Traveller Credit Card holder, you get:

  • Personal accident insurance and medical emergency expenses - up to USD 500,000
  • Daily in-hospital cash benefit – up to USD 100 per day
  • Loss of baggage - up to USD 3,000 with no deductible
  • Delay of baggage - up to USD 300
  • Trip cancellation - up to USD 7,500
  • Trip delays - USD 300
  • Missed connection - USD 300

For more information or claims, visit www.mcpeaceofmind.com

20% off on Careem Rides

Ride with Careem and enjoy 20% off twice a month when you pay with the Traveller Credit Card. Use promo code MASTERCARD.

0% Foreign Currency Fees

Pay 0% processing fee when you use your Traveller Credit Card overseas.
